summary: The "Shift2Rail Joint Undertaking" is a collaborative initiative under the umbrella of the "European Joint Undertaking," aimed at enhancing rail transport innovation within the EU. This entity leverages funding from the Horizon 2020 framework and engages various stakeholders, including academia, industry affiliates, and regulatory bodies like Eurocontrol. It focuses on addressing unmet societal needs through exploratory projects that maximize excellence in rail systems. By endorsing interrelated innovations and fostering openness, Shift2Rail aims to underpin the trajectory of rail transport towards a sustainable future. The initiative also emphasizes thematic interactions and periodicity in research, ensuring a robust framework for advancements in the sector.
